arts.ttl: Will Grigg scores late brace as Chesterfield beat Newport to move up to seventh
arts.sum: Dilan Markanday struck in the first minute for the Spireites after capitalising on a mix-up in the County defence.

Newport come into the game having lost their last two games against Bradford and Harrogate, respectively. They have now lost six of their last nine in all competitions. Chesterfield have drawn four o...

arts.ttl: Preview: Newport County vs. Chesterfield - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's League Two clash between Newport County and Chesterfield, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
